section.title: Upgrading to Proview 4.3.0
section.para: This document describes new functions i Proview V4.3.0, and how to upgrade a project from V4.2.0 to V4.3.0.

section.title: Graphical user interface
section.para: The graphical user interface is change to GTK (The GIMP Toolkit), on which the Gnome desctop is built. The interface is totaly rewritten and now have a more modern look and layout. The previous interface, Motif, is still available in the source code, but not included in the released packages.

section.title: Configurator
section.para: The Configurator now has a toolbar with buttons for save, enter editmode, zoom etc.

section.title: Installation
section.para: The dependency of Motif and Imlib is removed in the released packages, which strongly simpifies the installation procedure.

section.title: Database locked dialog
section.para: If the database is locked, a dialog window is viewed where the user can choose whether to exit, enter the loadfile, or remove the lock and enter the database.

section.title: Property EscapeStore for dynamic type ValueInput
section.para: Dynamic type ValueInput has a new property, EscapeStore. Normally the input value is stored when 'Return' is pressed. However, when EscapeStore is set, the value is stored when the input field looses input focus, or when 'Return' is pressed.

section.title: CStoNumSp
section.para: The Object attribute type is changed from pwr_tObjid to pwr_tAttrRef, and the Parameter attributes is removed.

section.title: Procedure for upgradeing
section.para: The upgrading has to be done from V4.2.0. If the project as a lower version, the upgrade has to be performed stepwise following the scheme V2.1 -> V2.7b -> V3.0 -> V3.3 -> V3.4b -> V4.0.0 -> V4.1.3 -> V4.2.0 -> V4.3.0

The upgrading is made in two steps:
Make a copy of the project
Execute upgrade.sh

section.title: Make a copy of the project
section.para: Do sdf to the project and start the administrator.

Now the Projectlist is opened. Enter edit mode, login as administrator if you lack access. Find the current project, and select Copy Project from the popup menu of the ProjectReg object. Open the copy and assign a suitable projectname and path. Change the vertion to V4.3.0. Save and close the administrator.
Do sdf to the project.

section.title: upgrade.sh
section.para: upgrade.sh is a script that is divided into a number of passes. After each pass you you have to answere whether to continue with the next pass or not.
Start the script with
and go through all the passes.

section.title: dumpdb
section.para: Creates a dump file for each volume in the project. The name of the dumpfile is $pwrp_db/'volumename'.wb_dmp

section.title: classvolumes
section.para: Create loadfiles and structfiles for the class volumes.

section.title: renamedb
section.para: Store the old databases under the name $pwrp_db/'volumename'.db.1.

section.title: dirvolume
section.para: Create a directory database and load the dumpfile for the project volume into the database.

section.title: loaddb
section.para: Create databases and load the dumpfiles into them.

section.title: compile
section.para: Compile all the plc programs.

section.title: createload
section.para: Create loadfiles for the root volumes.

section.title: createboot
section.para: Create bootfiles for all nodes in the project.
If the project contains any application programs, these has to be built manually.
Delete files from the upgrading procedure:
$pwrp_db/*.db.1 (V4.2 databases, directories which content also is removed)
